localizedIds.ja-JP: メンズ-ジャケット-ブルゾン

products.name: Off-White c/o Virgil Abloh OFF-WHITE C/O VIRGIL ABLOH MEN'S MECHANIC-INSPIRED COTTON CANVAS JACKET
products.brandedName: Off-White MEN'S MECHANIC-INSPIRED COTTON CANVAS JACKET
products.description: OFF-WHITE c/o Virgil Abloh's black cotton canvas jacket is embroidered at the chest with a white logo and a mechanic-inspired logo, and at back with white "Off-White HVAC Inc" lettering. Spread collar. Horizontal zip chest pocket. Double-welt side pockets. Adjustable snap cuffs. Gusseted shoulders. Embroidered phone numbers at back. 26" center back length (approximately). Two-way zip-front closure. Lined with black twill. Available in Black/White. 100% cotton. Dry clean. Made in Italy.

products.name: Comme des Garçons SHIRT BOY COMME DES GARÇONS SHIRT BOY MEN'S LOGO BOMBER JACKET
products.brandedName: Comme des Garçons SHIRT BOY COMME DES GARÇONS SHIRT BOY MEN'S LOGO BOMBER JACKET
products.unbrandedName: Comme des Garçons SHIRT BOY COMME DES GARÇONS SHIRT BOY MEN'S LOGO BOMBER JACKET
products.description: Crafted of light blue and cream tech satin, Comme des Garçons SHIRT BOY's bomber jacket is appliquéd at the back with a white plain-weave logo. Rib-knit stand shawl collar, cuffs, bottom. Double-welt side pockets. Long raglan sleeves. 23" center back length (approximately). Zip-front closure. Lined with quilted tech fabric. Available in Light Blue/Cream. 100% polyester. Lining: 100% polyester. Fill: 100% polyester. Dry clean. Made in Japan. Our model is 6'1"/185cm and wearing a size Medium.

products.name: Camo Arrows Printed & Patch Field Jacket
products.brandedName: Off-White Camo Arrows Printed & Patch Field Jacket
products.unbrandedName: Camo Arrows Printed & Patch Field Jacket
products.description: Front button closure . Button cuffs . Decorative embroidered patches . All over camouflage print may vary . Four front pockets . Cut for an oversized fit . Sample size: M

products.name: Burberry Brentfield bomber jacket
products.brandedName: Burberry Brentfield bomber jacket
products.description: Ink blue cotton blend Brentfield bomber jacket from Burberry.

products.name: CAFÉ DU CYCLISTE Jacqueline windproof cycle gilet
products.brandedName: CAFÉ DU CYCLISTE Jacqueline windproof cycle gilet
products.unbrandedName: CAFÉ DU CYCLISTE Jacqueline windproof cycle gilet
products.description: Café du Cycliste's tonal-blue geometric-print be Jacqueline gilet is cut from a windproof technical stretch fabric for a close fit ensuring a wide range of motion. It has a fleece-lined collar for comfort mesh inserts for ventilation and handy back pockets for your water bottle. The reflective back panel increases visibility in dark conditions too.

products.name: GUCCI Tiger-print shell bomber jacket
products.brandedName: Gucci Tiger-print shell bomber jacket
products.description: Gucci's sky-blue shell bomber jacket is made in Italy and decorated with the new-season Bengal tiger motif - note how it cleverly runs the length of the back. The navy and red ribbed trims nod to the iconic Web stripe. Fits true to size.

products.name: Moncler MONCLER MEN'S CAMOUFLAGE TECH-FABRIC HOODED PUFFER JACKET
products.brandedName: Moncler MEN'S CAMOUFLAGE TECH-FABRIC HOODED PUFFER JACKET
products.unbrandedName: MEN'S CAMOUFLAGE TECH-FABRIC HOODED PUFFER JACKET
products.description: Constructed of green and multicolored camouflage-print quilted tech fabric, Moncler's puffer jacket features a funnel neck and detachable hood. Signature Moncler logo patch at sleeve. Snap hand-warmer pockets. Snap flap sleeve pocket. Elastic cuffs. Brushed silvertone zipper. Two-way zip-front closure. Lined with navy tech fabric. Zip pocket at interior. Available in Green/Multi. 100% nylon. Fill: 90% down, 10% feathers. Dry clean. Made in Italy. Our model is 6'1"/185cm and wearing a size 3. Moncler returns cannot be accepted without the authentic triangle tag attached to the item.

products.name: Off-White c/o Virgil Abloh Men's Embellished Camouflage Cotton Field Jacket
products.brandedName: Off-White Men's Embellished Camouflage Cotton Field Jacket
products.unbrandedName: Men's Embellished Camouflage Cotton Field Jacket
products.description: Cut from green and brown camouflage cotton ripstop, OFF-WHITE c/o VIRGIL ABLOH's field jacket is embellished at the sleeves with multicolored patches and finished at the back with a white signature diagonal-striped X. The jacket is accented with red tech-canvas tabs that extend past the hem. Signature diagonal-striped X at back. Relaxed silhouette. Spread collar. Four flap patch front pockets. Long sleeves. Extended-tab cuffs. 32.5" center back length (approximately). Button-front closure. Available in Green/Multi. 100% cotton. Dry clean. Imported.;COTTON

products.name: MA-1 Bomber Jacket
products.brandedName: Club Monaco MA-1 Bomber Jacket
products.description:
We crafted our version of the classic bomber from a sleek technical fabric with an ultra smooth hand-feel. In timeless, versatile military green, it's the layer you'll reach for time and time again.
  • Shell: polyester/nylon; lining: polyester/cupro
  • Straight fit
  • 26 in length, based on a size M
  • Front zip closure; semi-standing collar; ribbed knit at collar, cuffs, and hem; side seam pockets with exposed zip closure
  • Lining with iridescent finish
  • Dry clean
  • Imported

products.name: Men's John Varvatos Star Usa Coated Moto Jacket
products.brandedName: John Varvatos Men's Coated Moto Jacket
products.description: A sheeny coating adds leather-like luster to a lightweight woven jacket with a definitive moto vibe. Brand: STAR USA. Style Name:John Varvatos Star Usa Coated Moto Jacket. Style Number: 5348595. Available in stores.

products.name: Spray Stripes Cotton Canvas Jacket
products.brandedName: Off-White Spray Stripes Cotton Canvas Jacket
products.description: Front button closure . Button cuffs . Canvas side straps . Sprayed diagonal stripes on back panel . Four front deconstructed front pockets . Sample size: M

products.name: J.Crew Ma-1 Cotton Bomber Jacket
products.brandedName: J.Crew Ma-1 Cotton Bomber Jacket
products.description: The MA-1 bomber jacket transcended its military roots long ago and is now considered a staple. Why? Because not only is it unequivocally cool, it's versatile, too. J.Crew 's version is cut from lightweight cotton and garment-dyed to softly fade over time, making it look and feel like an original. Wear it as a lightweight layer over T-shirts and sweaters. Shown here with Folk sweatshirt, Handvaerk T-shirt, AG Jeans jeans, Converse sneakers. - - Khaki cotton- Two front snap-fastening flap pockets, ribbed trims, internal patch pocket, fully lined - Snap and zip fastening- 100% cotton; lining: 100% polyester - Dry clean- Designer colour: Laurel Green- Imported

products.name: Balmain BALMAIN MEN'S COTTON HOODED PARKA
products.brandedName: Balmain MEN'S COTTON HOODED PARKA
products.description: Balmain's hooded parka is crafted of olive cotton plain-weave. Drawstring hood, waist, hem. Gun flaps. Snap flap patch chest pockets. Patch side pockets. Ventilating grommets under sleeves. Rib-knit cuffs. Shoulder yoke and two snap flap patch pockets at back. Polished goldtone hardware. 42" center back length (approximately). Two-way zip-front closure. Available in Olive. 100% cotton. Dry clean. Made in France. Our model is 6'1"/185cm and wearing a size Medium.

products.name: MONCLER Maglia knit-back quilted down gilet
products.brandedName: Moncler Maglia knit-back quilted down gilet
products.description: Moncler's navy gilet is less cumbersome than a coat but just as warm. It features a quilted shell front that's filled with down and feathers for insulation and has a slim shape that's contrasted with soft cotton panels. The label's signature tri-coloured trims lend graphic impact.

products.name: Off-White c/o Virgil Abloh OFF-WHITE C/O VIRGIL ABLOH MEN'S APPLIQUÉD FIELD JACKET
products.brandedName: Off-White MEN'S APPLIQUÉD FIELD JACKET
products.description: OFF-WHITE c/o Virgil Abloh's khaki cotton ripstop field jacket is appliquéd at the back with diagonal-striped twill tape. Spread collar. Four button flap patch pockets at front. Self-elbow patches. Adjustable button-tab cuffs. 30.5" center back length (approximately). Button-front closure. Webbed straps at interior hang below bottom. Available in Khaki. 100% cotton. Dry clean. Made in Italy.

products.name: Vetements Vetements x alpha industries reversible bomber
products.brandedName: Vetements x alpha industries reversible bomber
products.description: Black and orange oversized reversible bomber jacket from Vetements X Alpha Industries. This item is unisex. Dimensions: item fits oversize Composition: 100% nylon, lining: 100% nylon, fill: 100% polyster, 100% white duck down padding Care: dry clean only

products.name: River Island Mens Brown fleece lined corduroy jacket
products.brandedName: River Island Mens Brown fleece lined corduroy jacket
products.unbrandedName: Mens Brown fleece lined corduroy jacket
products.description: Brown corduroy fabric Fleece collar and lining Long sleeve Metallic buttoned front Chest pockets Our model wears a UK M and is 185.5cm/6'1'' tall

products.name: MONCLER Timothe nylon bomber jacket
products.brandedName: Moncler Timothe nylon bomber jacket
products.description: Moncler's black Timothe bomber jacket is a fail-safe off-duty piece. It's crafted from lightweight yet resilient shell and finished with a zip-fastening sleeve pocket and four pen slots. It runs true to size with a slim fit through the body.

products.name: Men's Moncler Maya Lacquered Down Jacket
products.brandedName: Moncler Men's Maya Lacquered Down Jacket
products.description: Glossy lacquered nylon gives a sleek, urban look to a luxurious hooded jacket featuring a channel-quilted design insulated with high-loft down fill that provides efficient, lightweight warmth. Brand: MONCLER. Style Name:Moncler Maya Lacquered Down Jacket. Style Number: 5392174. Available in stores.

products.name: CPO Nylon Bomber Jacket
products.brandedName: CPO Nylon Bomber Jacket
products.description:
Perfect lightweight bomber jacket from CPO in a minimalist design that features heavy-duty zippers at the front zip closure and the left sleeve pocket. Complete with thick rib-knit banding at the collar, cuffs + hem for a comfortable fit.
  • Nylon
  • Machine wash
  • Imported
  • Measurements taken from size Medium
  • Chest: 20"
  • Length: 27.5"

products.name: GUCCI GucciGhost-print satin bomber jacket
products.brandedName: Gucci GucciGhost-print satin bomber jacket
products.description: Gucci Creative director Alessandro Michele collaborates with New York street artist GucciGhost to design this ocean-blue satin bomber jacket. Crafted in Italy it's emblazoned with the red graffiti-inspired GG motif and white stars and is finished with traditional ribbed-knit details. The cut is relaxed and runs true to size.

products.name: VETEMENTS Oversized hooded raincoat
products.brandedName: Vetements Oversized hooded raincoat
products.description: Nod to the fashion zeitgeist by topping everyday looks with Vetements's black raincoat. Constructed from water-resistant rubberised fabric with a PVC coating sealed seams and underarm vents for breathability it features a gold logo on the chest and another printed in bright white across the back. The loose and oversized style is shaped with a drawstring hood and dropped shoulders.

products.name: Moncler MONCLER MEN'S FUR-TRIMMED QUILTED HOODED PARKA
products.brandedName: Moncler MEN'S FUR-TRIMMED QUILTED HOODED PARKA
products.description: Crafted of navy tech taffeta, Moncler's quilted parka is trimmed at hood with brown fur and at sleeves with wool twill. Detachable fur trim at toggle-drawstring hood. Snap throat latch. Snap flap chest pockets. Twill snap flap patch side pockets. Logo tab at left sleeve. Rib-knit gaiter cuffs. 30" center back length (approximately). Zip-front closure. Button placket. Lined with tech fabric. Zip pocket and toggle-drawstring waist at interior. Available in Navy/Brown. 100% polyamide. Combo: 100% virgin wool. Fill: 90% goose down, 10% feathers. Trim: 100% dyed coyote fur. Dry clean. Fur: specialty care. Imported. Coyote fur country of origin: Canada. Our model is 6'1"/185cm and wearing a size 2. Moncler returns cannot be accepted without the authentic triangle tag attached to the item.

products.name: OFF-WHITE Panelled cotton-canvas field jacket
products.brandedName: Off-White Panelled cotton-canvas field jacket
products.description: Off-White's khaki-green cotton-canvas field jacket is cut for a relaxed fit and finished with tonal-green camouflage-print sleeves and sides that are deliberately out of line with the solid front panels to create a contemporary step hem. Black ties complete the cool picture. Runs true to size.

products.name: Off-White c/o Virgil Abloh OFF-WHITE C/O VIRGIL ABLOH MEN'S "WORK" COTTON JACKET
products.brandedName: Off-White MEN'S "WORK" COTTON JACKET
products.description: OFF-WHITE c/o Virgil Abloh's white cotton canvas "Work" jacket is printed at back with a black logo. Notched collar. Patch side pockets. Raw edges and seams. 40" center back length (approximately). Hook-and-eye placket. Available in White. 100% cotton. Dry clean. Made in Italy.

products.name: OFF-WHITE Logo-print wool-blend bomber jacket
products.brandedName: Off-White Logo-print wool-blend bomber jacket
products.description: Creative director Virgil Abloh continues to put an urban slant on everyday pieces for Off-White including this black logo-print bomber jacket. Crafted to a relaxed silhouette it features a plethora of sportswear hallmarks - note the raglan sleeves slanted pockets and ribbed trims - and is finished with the designer's signature white stripes and spray paint-effect motifs at the back.

products.name: Bryce Packable Jacket
products.brandedName: J.Mclaughlin Bryce Packable Jacket
products.description:
Don't leave home without our super packable lightweight and water-resistant jacket.
  • Button front
  • Chest pocket
  • Adjustable back tabs
  • Comes with drawstring pouch
  • 30.5" long from top of center back (size M)
  • Material: 100% Nylon
  • Fabric: Nylon
  • Care: Machine Wash Cold/Flat Dry

products.name: 21 MEN Satin Bomber Jacket
products.brandedName: 21men 21 MEN Satin Bomber Jacket
products.description: A lightweight woven satin bomber jacket featuring long raglan sleeves with a contrast stripe and contrast piping down the center, snap-button front, front slant pockets, and ribbed trim. Content + Care - Shell & Lining: 100% polyester - Machine wash cold - Made in China

products.name: Tela Nylon Down Frost Finish Long Down Jacket
products.brandedName: Stone Island Tela Nylon Down Frost Finish Long Down Jacket
products.unbrandedName: Tela Nylon Down Frost Finish Long Down Jacket
products.description:
Down jacket from Stone Island in Black. Frost finish. Hood with detachable grey felted wool lining. Full zip front closure. Welt pocket with snap button closure at chest. Two slant pockets with flap and button closures at lower front. Interior pocket with button closure. Detachable Stone Island branded patch at left sleeve. Inset elasticized cuffs. Tonal stitching. Straight hem. Lined.

• Tela nylon
• 100% nylon shell
• 90% duck down, 10% feather padding
• Machine wash cold, hang dry

Note: Please see sizing tab for details.

products.name: Gucci Men's Leopard-Print Calf-Hair Collar Embellished Trucker Jacket
products.brandedName: Gucci Men's Leopard-Print Calf-Hair Collar Embellished Trucker Jacket
products.unbrandedName: Men's Leopard-Print Calf-Hair Collar Embellished Trucker Jacket
products.description: Constructed of blue denim, Gucci's trucker jacket is embellished with graffiti and spikes of various shapes and sizes. The jacket is finished with a leopard-print calf-hair spread collar and a multicolored Union Jack cat patch at the back. Spread collar. Front and back shoulder yoke. Button-through flap chest pockets. Single-button barrel cuffs. Silvertone hardware. 25.5" center back length (approximately). Button-front closure. Lined with red and black buffalo-plaid twill. Button tab besom pocket at interior. Available in Blue/Multi. 100% cotton. Collar: 100% dyed calf hair. Dry clean. Made in Italy. Dyed calf hair country of origin: Italy. Our model is 6'1"/185cm and wearing a size 46 EU.;DENIM,FUR

products.name: Greg Lauren Collide Maya Down Jacket
products.brandedName: Moncler Greg Lauren Collide Maya Down Jacket
products.unbrandedName: Greg Lauren Collide Maya Down Jacket
products.description: Created in collaboration with Greg Lauren . Collide Collection . Detachable hood . Front zip closure . Nylon down upper panels. Cotton canvas lower panels . Intentionally destroyed areas may vary . Two side pockets . Down feather filling

products.name: Neil Barrett Panelled Shell Bomber Jacket
products.brandedName: Neil Barrett Panelled Shell Bomber Jacket
products.description: Neil Barrett 's bomber jacket is an example of the label's clever craftsmanship - it's seamlessly panelled with graphic chevrons of mixed materials at the sleeves. The collar, cuffs and hem are made from a ribbed knit that has an athletic feel and will keep you warm and comfortable. Try wearing it over sweatpants and sneakers to channel the brand's sportswear leanings. Shown here with Neil Barrett T-shirt, Alexander McQueen trousers, Lanvin sneakers. - - Black shell- White and grey sleeve panels, two front zipped slit pockets, ribbed trims, two zipped internal pockets, fully lined- Two-way zip fastening - Fabric1: 64% cotton, 36% polyamide; fabric2: 100% polyester; fabric3: 52% polyamide, 48% polyester; trim: 98% polyamide, 2% elastane; lining: 100% cupro- Machine wash or dry clean- Imported

products.name: MONCLER Christopher quilted down jacket
products.brandedName: Moncler Christopher quilted down jacket
products.description: Moncler's navy quilted shell Christopher jacket is a timeless transitional style. It has drawstring hem ties so you can cinch the relaxed fit and is finished with an insulating down and feather filling. The point collar is a smart finishing touch. Runs true to size.

products.name: Helmut Lang HELMUT LANG MEN'S LOGO-EMBOSSED JERSEY BOMBER JACKET
products.brandedName: Helmut Lang MEN'S LOGO-EMBOSSED JERSEY BOMBER JACKET
products.description: Helmut Lang's black bonded jersey bomber jacket is embossed at the sleeves with a logo. Rib-knit stand shawl collar, cuffs, bottom. Split kangaroo pocket. 28" center back length (approximately). Two-way zip-front closure. Available in Black. 77% polyester, 18% rayon, 5% spandex. Machine wash. Imported. Our model is 6'1"/185cm and wearing a size Medium.

products.name: Trent Quilted Jacket
products.brandedName: J.Mclaughlin Trent Quilted Jacket
products.description:
Our packable quilted jacket is a classic to always have close at hand. Works over everything from a suit to your Saturday jeans and tee.
  • Long sleeves
  • Zip front with snap closure
  • Chest pockets
  • Hand pockets
  • Interior pocket
  • Back vents
  • 28.5" long from top of center back (size M)
  • Material: 100% Nylon
  • Fabric: Nylon
  • Care: Machine Wash Cold, Lay Flat To Dry.

products.name: Nikelab Acg Metamorphosis Bomber Jacket
products.brandedName: Nikelab Acg Metamorphosis Bomber Jacket
products.description: Created in collaboration with Errolson Hugh founder of Acronym. 30 Denier ripstop fabric . High collar. Front two-way zip closure . Elastic cuffs and hem . Articulated sleeves for greater range of motion . DWR- Durable water repellent finish. Heat-sealed ACG logo on front . Two side zip pockets . One sleeve zip pocket . Sample size: M

products.name: Men's Stutterheim Stockholm Waterproof Hooded Raincoat
products.brandedName: Stutterheim Men's Stockholm Waterproof Hooded Raincoat
products.description: Stutterheim's new-classic Stockholm raincoat is modeled after styles traditionally worn by Scandinavian fishermen but designed with a more streamlined profile and aesthetic. The coated PVC surface of the midweight shell wicks all moisture for optimal interior dryness and comfort when you're caught in the nastiest, blustering wet-weather conditions. Plus it's packable, so you can always be ready for anything. Brand: STUTTERHEIM. Style Name:Stutterheim Stockholm Waterproof Hooded Raincoat. Style Number: 5026850. Available in stores.

products.name: Men's Alpha Industries 'Ma-1' Slim Fit Bomber Jacket
products.brandedName: Alpha Industries Men's 'Ma-1' Slim Fit Bomber Jacket
products.description: Originally designed for military pilots, this slim-fitting civilian-issue bomber jacket from Alpha Industries is made from incredibly durable, water-resistant nylon with the classic poly-fill orange lining traditionally used for easy visibility during rescue missions. The classic blouson silhouette with stretchy ribbed trim and puffy sleeves allows for easy layering when the seasons start to cool. Brand: ALPHA INDUSTRIES. Style Name:Alpha Industries 'Ma-1' Slim Fit Bomber Jacket. Style Number: 5214759_2. Available in stores.

products.name: MONCLER Jupiter camouflage-print bomber jacket
products.brandedName: Moncler Jupiter camouflage-print bomber jacket
products.description: Moncler's tonal-blue camouflage-print Jupiter bomber jacket has a slim-fitting denim body that's offset with long shell sleeves and ribbed-jersey trims. A cool combination of urban style and classic sportswear it's finished with the signature logo-embroidered badge. Runs true to size.

products.name: Off-White c/o Virgil Abloh Men's "Mens" Cotton-Blend Hooded Work Jacket
products.brandedName: Off-White Men's "Mens" Cotton-Blend Hooded Work Jacket
products.description: Cut from black cotton-blend canvas, OFF-WHITE c/o VIRGIL ABLOH's hooded work jacket is designed at the back with "Mens" lettering in white and a Surrealist-inspired multicolored graphic patch. Drawstring hood. Kangaroo pocket. Long sleeves. Single-snap cuffs. Rib-knit hem. 27" center back length (approximately). Two-way zip-front closure. Lined with sherpa. Available in Black/White/Multi. 97% cotton, 3% elastane. Dry clean. Made in Italy.;CANVAS,COTTON

products.name: Rick Owens DRKSHDW bomber jacket
products.brandedName: Rick Owens bomber jacket
products.description: Black bomber jacket from Rick Owens DRKSHDW.

products.name: Craig Green Hooded Jacket
products.brandedName: Moncler Craig Green Hooded Jacket
products.description: Created in collaboration with Craig Green . Drawstring hood . Ribbed collar. Front zip closure . Logo details . Two front zip pocket . Sample size: 3

products.name: MONCLER Dereck quilted down jacket
products.brandedName: Moncler Dereck quilted down jacket
products.description: Moncler's navy quilted-nylon Dereck jacket will make a fail-safe addition to any transitional roster. It's filled with down and feathers for supreme insulation and has a relaxed shape with functional front pockets to keep small essentials within easy reach. The label's cream navy and red logo accents the sleeve. Runs true to size.

products.name: Technical jersey bomber with hood
products.brandedName: Gucci Technical jersey bomber with hood
products.description:
One of the House's trademarks since it first appeared in the 50s, the traditional red and green Web tape pays homage to the equestrian world. For Fall Winter 2017, the striped detail is presented on this hooded bomber in technical jersey, contrasting a black base.
  • Black technical jersey with green and red Web stripe
  • Detachable hood
  • Zip closure
  • 55% polyester and 45% cotton
  • Made in Italy
  • The model is 6'1" and is wearing size 46

products.name: Balenciaga Men's C Curve Trapeze Puffer Jacket
products.brandedName: Balenciaga Men's C Curve Trapeze Puffer Jacket
products.unbrandedName: Men's C Curve Trapeze Puffer Jacket
products.description: Balenciaga's black puffer jacket is styled with a structural C Curve trapeze silhouette. Logo at front. Stand collar. Tuck away hood. Angled snap side pockets. 31.5" center back length (approximately). Two-way zip-front closure. Lined. Semi-exposed C Curve structure at interior. Available in Black. 54% polyester, 46% viscose. Fill: 100% duck feathers. Dry clean. Imported.

products.name: Men's Nike Sportswear Windrunner Jacket Metallic
products.brandedName: Nike Men's Sportswear Windrunner Jacket Metallic
products.description:
Lightweight jacket from Nike in Metallic Silver. Hood with bill and adjustable drawstrings. Full zip front closure. Heat pressed logo at chest. Two zip pockets at lower front. Straight back yoke with vent. Raglan sleeves. Ribbed trim. Straight hem. Lined.

• Ripstop
• 100% nylon shell
• 100% recycled polyester lining
• Hand wash cold, dry flat

products.name: BALENCIAGA Logo-collar shearling jacket
products.brandedName: Balenciaga Logo-collar shearling jacket
products.description: Balenciaga's black lamb shearling jacket makes a case for of-the-moment updates of timeless classics. Designer Demna Gvasalia reshapes the aviator bomber style to his signature boxy cut with broad shoulders before boldly adding a full-blown brand logo in optical white to the black shearling collar. Wear it with black jeans for a monochrome look with the right amount of edge. Fits true to size for a spacious fit.

products.name: SAINT LAURENT Snake-appliqué satin bomber jacket
products.brandedName: Saint Laurent Snake-appliqué satin bomber jacket
products.description: This black bomber jacket demonstrates Saint Laurent's luxuriously rebellious attitude. It's crafted from lustrous satin and turns to reveal a tonal bead and sequin-embellished snake motif at the back - complete with bottle-green crystal eyes. It comes up small so we recommend taking the next size up.

products.name: OFF-WHITE Patch-detail camouflage-print cotton jacket
products.brandedName: Off-White Patch-detail camouflage-print cotton jacket
products.description: Scattered patches decorate the sleeves of this tonal-green and black camouflage-print Off-White cotton jacket while bold white graphics on the back give the style a vibrant rework. Added to the classic shape side-hem red grosgrain loose straps complete the list of accents that epitomise the brand's urban aesthetic. Fits true to size.

products.name: Comme Des Garçons Shirt metallic bomber jacket
products.brandedName: Comme des Garcons metallic bomber jacket
products.description: Blue and grey wool blend metallic bomber jacket from Comme Des Garçons Shirt Boy.
